descriptionHtml:
Fyra Ignis

Fire Spells

Meteor Strike(outside only)
Collapsing sphere
Micro burst
Fire Barrage(inside only Ex: caves)
Heatwave
Quick Fire Bolt

If you want to try fire magic type in console (help "fire magic (player)"
This spells will only activate when enemy is hit by spell.
Not work if enemy use ward.

She lives in breezehome.
[b]
Required[/b]
Skyrim
SKSE
32xp maximum skeleton
Hdt physics extension
[b]
Used files to create this[/b]
SKSE
32xp maximum skeleton
Hdt physics
Sg female textures renewal
Ks hairdos hdt
Unpb blessed body
author: Silent Rue
